Name: butter production, from cream, from cow milk | buttermilk, from cow milk | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/105:Manufacture of dairy products/1050:Manufacture of dairy products
Description: A number of continuous techniques are available such as methods in which cream is subjected to high speed churning and continuous working. The main steps of buttermaking are always the same.  ;Scheme of butter manufacture from cream (EU Commission, IPPC, 2006, Reference Document on Best Available Techniques in the Food, Drink and Milk Industries).
